title: ISic004270. Epitaph erected by Annius Antonienus
body:
Facsimile Images

Des Manib(us)
An(nius) Antonienus
servi Fabiani
patri opt(imo) feci[t]

Apparatus criticus

Text after ILipara 759

English translation

To the spirits of the departed. Annius Antonienus, son of the slave Fabianus, set this up for his most excellent father.

Italian translation

Agli spiriti dei defunti. Annius Antonienus, figlio dello schiavo Fabianus, ha eretto questo per il suo ottimo padre.

commentary

The resolution of the text is far from certain, but the logical grammatical reading seems to be the one proposed here.>

bibliography

  • 759 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
